Html: nobody can help me? Please is important

Sorry for my bad english. Thanks for the quick reply.
Using GMapRoute class I'm faced with the same problems.

It does not work:
item.Stroke.Color = Color.Green;
I found the solution:
item.Stroke = new Pen(Color.FromArgb(144, Color.Blue));
where item is GMapPolygon or GMapRoute.
